attributes.action: give chances to youngsters in the employment sector
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having lived in Scunthorpe for 13 years living with and befriending numerous people, i think it is time for real change. Give youngsters the chance of apprentiships, not staying at school until they are 18. Give me your vote it will change

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
